sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Dialog } from '@headlessui/react'; import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { Candidate } from '../types'; interface CandidateDetailsModalProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; candidate: Candidate; } export const CandidateDetailsModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, candidate, }) => { return (
Candidate Details

Name

{candidate.name}

Email

{candidate.email}

Phone

{candidate.phone}

Location

{candidate.location}

Position

{candidate.position}

Status

{candidate.status}

Match Score

{candidate.matchScore}%

Work Experience

{candidate.experience.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.position}

{exp.company}

{exp.startDate} - {exp.endDate}

{exp.description}

))}

Education

{candidate.education.map((edu, index) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}

{edu.field} • {edu.graduationDate}

))}

Skills

{candidate.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}

Languages

{candidate.languages.map((language, index) => ( {language} ))}
{candidate.certifications.length > 0 && (

Certifications

    {candidate.certifications.map((cert, index) => (
  • {cert}
    • ))}
)} {candidate.notes && (

Notes

{candidate.notes}

)}
); };
